qas.question: What new feature for PS3 was released in September of 2009?
At what event did Sony announce What's New?
What type of information is disseminated through What's New?
What's geographical area does What's New tailor information to for each user?
What new feature for PS3 was released in September of 2008?

context: <a0_0><b5_0>What's New<b5_0/><a0_0/> was announced at <a1_0><b6_0>Gamescom<b6_0/><a1_0/> 2009 and was released on September 1, 2009, with PlayStation 3 system software 3.0. The feature was to replace the existing [<a2_0><b7_0>Information Board<b7_0/><a2_0/>], which displayed <a3_0><b8_0>news<b8_0/><a3_0/> from the PlayStation website associated with the user's <a4_0><b9_0>region<b9_0/><a4_0/>. The concept was developed further into a major PlayStation Network feature, which interacts with the [Status Indicator] to display a ticker of all content, excluding recently played content (currently in North America and Japan only).
